original_text: Repent, therefore, of this wickedness of yours, and pray to the Lord that, if possible, the intent of your heart may be forgiven you.
korean_text: 그러므로 너의 이 악함을 회개하고 주께 기도하라 혹 마음에 품은 것을 사하여 주시리라

sentences.original_text: Repent, therefore, of this wickedness of yours,
that the intent of your heart
if possible, may be forgiven you.
